Title: Object: Comment Joseph avec Marie sont contrains de prendre la fuytte pour fuyr la tyrannie D'Herode, ils sen vont en Egypte
Description: Flight into Egypt; with Joseph leading the Virgin and Child, who are riding the ass, to the right; in decorative border; on verso a text in decorative border showing Biblical scenes, notably God with Adam and Eve and the Crucifixion; illustration from a Book of Hours Metalcut and letterpress
Dimensions: Height: 158 millimetres (image size; border cut at l)
Curator's comments: The same cuts occur in a book of hours published in Paris by Thielman Kerver, 1529; the borders are the same as in this edition but the type and arrangement are different.
Acquisition name: Bequeathed by: Sir Augustus Wollaston Franks (L.344)
